description:
Neodymium Company, part of Juden-chan`s division, took a hit from the latest accident.  This time, however, the target has changed, becoming Kajihara Kentaro - a countercurrent target - who received the designation of a Z-target meaning that he could possibly be the perfect target they`re looking for.  Unaware of this development, Plug and her team start to investigate on their own...
Source: crunchyroll
